title: ICE: impossible case reached with conditional constant

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

body:
I have

```
                pub const $max: i128 = if ($t::max_value() as i128) < 0 {
                    i128::max_value()
                } else {
                    $t::max_value() as i128
                };
```

which causes

```
src/librustc_const_math/int.rs:106:47: 106:61 error: could not evaluate referenced constant
src/librustc_const_math/int.rs:106             (InferSigned(a @ ibounds::I8MIN...ibounds::I8MAX), I8(_)) => I8(a as i8),
                                                                                 ^~~~~~~~~~~~~~
error: internal compiler error: ../src/librustc_passes/consts.rs:220: impossible case reached
note: the compiler unexpectedly panicked. this is a bug.
note: we would appreciate a bug report: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#bug-reports
note: run with `RUST_BACKTRACE=1` for a backtrace
thread 'rustc' panicked at 'Box<Any>', ../src/librustc_errors/lib.rs:619

```
